_source.text: 419 points out: "For those traveling on the Blue/Orange Line the walk to Capitol South might be better than L'Enfant, so as to possibly grab a seat on the train before it hits the train-changing station crunch at L'Enfant."

text: 419 points out: "For those traveling on the Blue/**Orange** **Line** the walk to Capitol South might be
**better** **than** L'Enfant, so as to possibly grab a seat on the train before it hits the train-changing station crunch at L'Enfant."
